step_feedback.feedback: Good job tightening your fists and muscles while bringing your arms in. Keep up the controlled inhale.
Excellent! You're opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally while relaxing and exhaling. Great form.
Well done on maintaining good form during this step. Continue to focus on the outward movement and muscle relaxation.
Your arm extension and relaxation are looking good. Keep the movements smooth and controlled as you exhale.
Great job completing the repetitions! Your movements were consistent and followed the instructions well.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists tight and inhale as you bring your arms in, then exhale and relax as you extend them outwards. Keep up the good work!
